definitions.definition: A person who makes, repairs or sells things of gold , especially jewelry.
A banker (because the goldsmiths of London used to receive money on deposit , being equipped to keep it safely).

main_definition: A person who makes, repairs or sells things of gold , especially jewelry.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A banker (because the goldsmiths of London used to receive money on deposit , being equipped to keep it safely).
